name: Under-Cover
description:
As a kid you always knew that the thin layer of feathers and cotton was the only protection you had from the famished monstrosities lurking in the dark corners of your room. This fact has never been more true.

You are the only righteous foot that can protect frightened kids from the starving clutches of the Boogeymen. Be swift, be strong and keep the children under the covers!


How to play:

  • use the mouse to move the foot around the map
  • hold LMB to grab the sheets or the bed to move it around

Credits:

  • Konrad Słabig - code
  • Michał Król - art
